N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4250.5 - Research grant

State Regulations
(a) Upon
approval of a proposal by the committee and subsequently by the commission, the
committee shall then enter into a contractual relationship with the applicant
for the research grant within the limit of the funds available therefor and
subject to the following limitations: (1)
all
grants so provided shall be used for the direct cost of approved projects and
shall not be used to supplant funds otherwise available to the applicant, to
the institution with which he is affiliated, or for the general cost recoveries
that are rightfully the prior obligation of the institution to which the
research grant is made; (2)
no
funds shall be expended for the acquisition, construction or renovation of
capital facilities without specific prior written approval by the
committee; (3)
payments shall be
made upon certified vouchers submitted to the committee and prepared in a
format satisfactory to the committee and to the commission. (b) Copies of grant contracts
shall be furnished to this commission, the harness fund and the thoroughbred
fund. Notes
